title: Greg Gutfeld on Cancel Culture, Social Media, and his New Book (Ep 1311)
description:
In this wide-ranging interview with Fox News’ host Greg Gutfeld, we discuss his new book “The Plus,” the pernicious effects of cancel culture, the future influence of social media on the country, and more.
